entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Local rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to 12 by morning. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
